column5: I know this is the most asked question but...  I only can get the link to appear in the post not the pic  what am I doing wrong  thanks for the help  http://i67.photobucket.com/albums/h292/pik...pg?t=1224271346  TB
use the {img} picture URL here {/img} tags..... replace {} with []  or click the picture button and add the URL..... then hit ok.
feeling more stupid than usual  Gerrit once more in english if you could  thanks for your patience and the help  TB
You are using photobucket,just click on the bottom link and presto done.

If you'll click on the "quote" button on any post that displays a pic you'll be able to see the "img" code before and after the pic link.  [ img ]  http://i67.photobucket.com/albums/h292/pikeie2/DSCF3033.jpg  [ /img ]  That's pikies pic but I put a space between eack "img code so you can see what it looks like... hope this helps.
awesome  thanks everyone for helpin the newbie  more pics to come  TB

Joined: 16-November 06 I checked when you joined  using newbie as an excuse doesn't cut it  having a bad day  hung over  strung out on drugs  hen pecked till you can't think strait  are all excuses you could use   I hope that helps.......LOL  glad you got it working
I'll chose excuse number 6  Newbie to posting pics is what I should have said .  TB
tinbanger, from the pic you posted and the bend on the rod.... looked like you had a fighter on  Any details to that fight or were you snagged to bottom?? Leechman
